display_long_description:
Lethal Reborn is a full remake of the cult VR experience Lethal Ape, rebuilt from the ground up to deliver more intensity, more horror, and more freedom than ever before. Designed for players who crave primal movement and relentless survival, this reimagined version takes everything fans loved about the original and evolves it into something darker, sharper, and more immersive.

In Lethal Reborn, you step into the body of a powerful creature caught between man and beast, trapped in a corrupted world of glitching shadows and endless threats. Use your hands to climb, leap, and swing through warped environments, where verticality and agility are the only paths to survival. Enemies are faster, the world is more hostile, and every encounter forces you to think like a predator — or be hunted like prey.

With enhanced VR mechanics, improved visuals, and a refined movement system, Lethal Reborn doesn’t just revive Lethal Ape — it transforms it. Whether you’re escaping through broken landscapes, testing your reflexes against brutal challenges, or simply exploring the eerie, atmospheric world, every moment pushes you deeper into the chaos.

This isn’t just a remake. It’s a rebirth. Welcome back to the lab — only now, it’s more lethal than ever.
